q: spark for Detroit after a slow start, winning his first game since joining the Pistons, 100-92 over the Sacramento Martin Luther King on Tuesday night. "It was a huge lift off of me," Allen Iverson said. I knew it would happen. You think every game you go out and play it's going to happen. It feels good. I wanted to get the monkey off my back. I'm just excited that I got my first win and I can now try to get a lot more. Tayshaun Prince added 26 points and 11 rebounds for the Pistons, who had lost their first two games since acquiring Allen Iverson from Denver last week for All-Star point guard Chauncey Billups , key reserve Antonio McDyess and Cheikh Samb . "Volledige web op de telefoon" Onderdeel in die grote update is een mobiele versie van IE9 met hardware-acceleratie voor Windows Phone. Dit is een goed voorbeeld van het samenbrengen van onderdelen binnen Microsoft om de gebruikservaring van Windows Phone te verbeteren , aldus Steve Ballmer . "We moeten het volledige web naar de telefoon brengen."
